title: HOUR 2 - Colin & Joy Unveil New Years Resolutions for Professional Sports!
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Colin & Joy Unveil New Years Resolutions for Professional Sports!
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, it's the final Blazin' 5 of 2021. Colin hopes to go out with a bang. Later, Colin welcomes in FOX Sports NFL analyst Greg Jennings to discuss the fallout from unvaccinated quarterbacks missing crucial late-season games due to covid as well as other pertinent gridiron topics. Finally, Colin and Joy unveil New Year's resolutions for a handful of teams, professional athletes and coaches. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
